page.title: 02North Riding College
page.content: The{North Riding College of Education} teaches teachers. It is being threatened by the Government because they think the College is too small, too isolated and too expensive. The Principal of the College says all these reasons are untrue. The students and staff were very suprised when they heard about it. The students are well taught and get jobs all over the World when they leave. A campaign has been organised to save the College and the public are responding very well. Thousands of people have signed a petition to the Minister of Education. If the College closes 545 people will lose their job and the local economy will lose Â£2 million per year. Our school uses the College facilities a lot and we wish them{GOOD LUCK}when the big decision comes on July 28th. 1985
